abstract.text: A description of a conversion from one image format to another.

inlineContent.text: class is an opaque type that contains information needed to do a rapid conversion from one image type to another.
You use the converter creation functions, for example,

, to create instances of converters. Sometimes, there can be an overhead when creating a converter, so create them in advance and reuse them. Converters are thread safe; that is, you can use the same object concurrently in multiple threads.

abstract.text: Make large-scale mathematical computations and image calculations, optimized for high performance and low energy consumption.
Precompute translation values to optimize color space conversion and other pointwise operations.

doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation.title: Applying color transforms to images with a multidimensional lookup table

abstract.text: Learn the fundamentals of the convert-any-to-any function by converting a CMYK image to an RGB image.

doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation.title: Building a basic image conversion workflow

abstract.text: Create vImage buffers with the correct dimensions to convert to and from images with subsampled chroma information.
A description of a conversion from one image format to another.
Converts the pixels in a vImage buffer to another format.
The number of destination buffers written to by the converter.
Returns a list of vImage destination buffer types, specifying the order of planes.
Creates a vImage converter that converts a Core Video-formatted image to a Core Graphics-formatted image.
Creates a vImage converter that converts from one vImage Core Graphics image format to another.
Creates a vImage converter that converts a Core Graphics-formatted image to a Core Video-formatted image.
Determines whether a converter is capable of operating in place.
The number of source buffers written to by the converter.
Returns a list of vImage source buffer types, specifying the order of planes.
Creates a vImage converter that converts a Core Graphics-formatted image to a Core Video-formatted image.
Creates a vImage converter that converts a Core Video-formatted image to a Core Graphics-formatted image.
Creates an any-to-any converter that uses a color conversion information object to convert from one image format to another.
Creates a vImage converter that converts from one vImage Core Graphics image format to another.
Creates a vImage converter to convert from one vImage Core Graphics image format to another, using custom ColorSync transform.
A type that can be hashed into a `Hasher` to produce an integer hash value.
A type that can be compared for value equality.
